attributes.action: Referendum on continued membership of the European Court of Human Rights
attributes.additional_details:
The European Court of Human Rights is constantly riding rough shod over the will of the honest, law abiding, financial contributors by supporting the claims of immigrants and criminals. It is time to stop this NOW.
Criminals by their very actions have no right to be treated by the norms of civilised society until they have completed their sentence.
Immigrants should be required to integrate with language and culture, not create ghetto's and they should be entitled to NOTHING from the public purse until they have joined and integrated.
